Installation

How To Install?

In the following are the steps to install Cascade theme

  1. Copy all modules into sites/all/modules folder
  2. Copy all themes into sites/all/themes folder
  3. Enable theme 'bootstrap' and set theme 'metronic' as default
  4. Enable DesignsSquare.com Library, DesignsSquare.com Library: Sample Data, DesignsSquare.com TEMPLATE_API widget
  5. Enable module DesignsSquare.com METRONIC_THEME widget.
  6. Enable module Designssquare.com: Theme: Metronic: Sample Data if you wish sample data(recommended).
  7. Revert any features in OVERRIDE state and clear all cache

-- OR --

Only One command with Drush tool - Workflow as following:

drush pa new-install @ALIAS --package=path/to/package.tar.gz --env=test --tag=kickstart,editor,tune_up

This command will do it all. It will spin new Drupa instance, install and configure Metronic theme. It will also import sample data, install and configure ckeditor theme integration for seamless editing, and tune with some popular modules such as admin_menu, module_fileter,etc. If you don't like to have any of the extra - sample data import, ckeditor intergration or tune up, then just run without that tag name "--tag". For more details, see workflow documentation section "Profile It ALL" here

About Menus

To have icons in the the menu item, make sure you add the html icon tags in the menu item title (i.e. Calendar). Also ensure you select 'Allow html' for the menu item containing the icon, thus, html

Theme Settings

The Metronic theme settings allows the following styles to be configurable:

  • Layout Style: 'Boxed', 'Fluid'
  • Color Schema: six predefined color schemas
  • Header: 'Fixed', 'Default'
  • Sidebar: 'Fixed', 'Default'
  • Sidebar Position: 'Right', 'Left'
  • Footer: 'Fixed', 'Default'

NOTE: The sidebar will only be fixed if the header is fixed

About Blocks

Metronic Drupal theme utilizes boxes module for blocks. The boxes are managed by context module. There is currently one main context - metronic_sidewide_context

In the following is list of additional boxes included in Metronic Drupal theme:

  • Dashboard Date Box

    The box to display date range for the dashboard.

  • Theme Styler Box

    The box to display different Design Theme settings. This is not hooked to Drupal Theme settings. Please, see Appearance->Theme->Settings->Metronic for Drupal theme settings

  • Notifications Box

    The box with drop down for notification, messages and pending tasks is assigned to Top Bar by default

  • Copyrights Box

    The box with copyrights disclaimer assigned to Footer by default

  • Actions Box

    The box with different actions assigned to Breadcrumb Sidebar region by default

  • Footer Copyrights Box

    The box with copyrights assigned to Login Footer region by default

  • Quick Sidebar Box

    The box for menu of user,alerts and more assigned to Quick Sidebar region by default

Fields

In the following are additional custom fields used in Metronic Drupal Theme

  • Intro[field_page_information]

    a little intro about the page displayed by the title

About Regions

In the following is list of new regions and ones from core of Drupal all used in Metronic Drupal Theme:

  • Breadcrumbs Sidebar(breadcrumbs_sidebar)
    The region on the right side of breadcrumbs. By default the block - Dashboard Date is assigned to this region
  • Theme Panel(theme_panel)
    The region on the right side of the page title&info. By default the block - Theme Styler is assigned to this region
  • Top Bar(header)
    The region on the top bar right of the logo. By default, the block - Notifications is assigned to this region
  • Footer(footer)
    The region on bottom of the page. By default, the block - Copyrights is assigned to this region
  • Login Footer(login_footer)
    The region on bottom of login page. By default, the block - Login Copyrights is assigned to this region
  • Quick Sidebar(quick_sidebar)
    The region on the right side hidden till you click the icon on the right top corner. By default, the block - Quick Sidebar is assigned to this region

Image Styles

The Metronic Drupal Admin theme comes with the following additional image styles:

  • User Profile:(ds_user_profile) The height and widht of the user profile picture is used by this style effect
  • Avatar:(ds_avatar) The height and the width of the avatar is used by this style effect

The style effects are located "Admin" -> "Media" -> "Image Styles"(/admin/media/image-styles

Dependent Modules

  • menu_html : to allow html in menu items
  • context : to reuse blocks such as search block,etc
  • boxes: for custom blocks

Release History

Release 0.1
  • All basic functionality
Release 0.2
  • Lower header to avoid conflict with Drupal top bar menu
  • fix PHP 7.3 issues
  • breadcrumbs icons only for home fix
  • minimizing main menu fix for icons
  • add theme settings to make color schemes, layouts, sidebar, header, footer configurable
  • fix components(menu,header,etc) disappearing on admin path
  • Add CKEditor custom styple/js support
  • Remove summary field for custom types
Release 0.3
  • fix field display for About Us
  • ensure CKEditor is not removing empty "a" tags for social icons
  • fix contact form to show up
  • fix quick sidebar to avoid showing frame without sidebar content
  • fix extra calendar to show up on each edit/save
  • add functionality to import styles/js for blocks as well as content to make CKEditing seamless
  • incorporate two custom image styles - User Profile & Avatar for changing user profile picture and avatar dimensions from UI
Release 0.4
  • fix head title
  • fix contact us template
  • fix breadcrumbs for polls
  • fix horizontal tob bar align at top for authentic users
  • removed display field at the bottom for about us page
  • removed close round botton on top of footer
  • fix side pop up menu
  • fix polls mis-align
  • fix views for missing path and wrong formating in template api
  • added virtual host directory support
Release 0.5
  • fix quick sidebar icon to disappear when quick sidebar block is turned off
  • add new better fix for poll conflicts with Metronic theme
  • fix css conflicts with webform module and Metronic theme
  • fix source mode for CKEditor to work with Metronic.
Release 0.5.1
[CODE, STRUCTURE deployment]
  • fix footer for login screen
  • fix email input for contact template
  • prevent CKEditor to remove empty anchor tags
Release 0.5.2
[CODE deployment]
  • fix css for panel label
  • resolved input alignment conflict for other than Metronic theme
  • improved js removal functionality for CKEditor
Release 0.5.3
[CODE deployment]
  • Align Views Exposed Form
  • Align Webform NEXT PAGE Button
  • Redone panel label layout for none metronic pages
  • stopped floating unnecessary js for none metronic pages that were logging errors
Release 0.5.4
[CODE deployment]
  • Extracted Login, Registration and Password Reset forms in their own templates part of Template API
Release 0.5.5
[CODE deployment]
  • Removed manual template includes for registration, login and registration forms in the Page Login template
  • Incorporate Status Message Template
  • Ensure theme's breadcrumb layouts are used for authenticated user that are not admin role
Release 0.5.6
[CODE deployment]
  • Fix CKeditor integration to support drupal instance running on sub-directory instead of root
Release 0.5.7
[CODE deployment]
  • Updated Contact Form so the current user name, email fills the from automatically. Also provide ability to configure default values for TAPI External Configs
